inclusion.criterion: recovered from the toxic effects of prior therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate liver function (SGOT and bilirubin < 2 times ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: radiographic evidence for tumor progression by MRI or CT scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: prior therapy that included interstitial brachytherapy or stereotactic radiosurgery with confirmation of true progressive disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: significant medical illnesses that cannot be adequately controlled
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: active infection or serious intercurrent medical illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant/breast feeding and not agree to practice adequate contraception
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: disease that will obscure toxicity or dangerously alter drug metabolism
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 45-year-old man with a history of anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine complicated by severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, high-dose steroids, hypertension, and chronic pain.
